# MLTensor.ResizeMethod.nearestNeighbor

**Case**

The nearest interpolation mode where values are interpolated using the closest neighbor pixel.

## Declaration

```swift
case nearestNeighbor
```

## Resize methods

- **MLTensor.ResizeMethod.bilinear(alignCorners:)**: The bilinear interpolation mode where values are computed using bilinear interpolation of 4 neighboring pixels.

items.description: The bilinear interpolation mode where values are computed using bilinear interpolation of 4 neighboring pixels.
items.name: MLTensor.ResizeMethod.bilinear(alignCorners:)
